segments.text: Could I have a word with you , Madam ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is that you , Janice ? Just speaking .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have to tell you that I can't be in today and tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So sorry to hear that . What's wrong with you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I feel sick and coughed a lot at night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is that serious ? You ought to see a doctor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I did this in the morning . And my doctor wanted me to have a rest these two days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's good . Do you suppose you will be back at company the day after tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope so . And I will definitely tell you if I can not .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , take care of yourself . And hope you will be better as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S2
